mapper.insert: insert into user_request(d1, d2, d3, d4, d5, d_etc, dvedio, dimg1, dimg2, dimg3, dimg4, pno) values (#{d1}, #{d2}, #{d3}, #{d4}, #{d5}, #{d_etc}, #{dvedio}, #{dimg1}, #{dimg2}, #{dimg3}, #{dimg4}, #{pno})
mapper.select: select * from allrequinfo where is_checked=0 order by rno desc
select * from user_request where is_checked=0 and pno=#{pno}
mapper.update: update user_request set is_checked=1 where rno=#{rno}
mapper.select: select * from user_request where pno=#{pno} and date(regdate)-date(now()) < 3
